name: Husy: Collective Singular & Grammatical Identity Crisis
description: Tests AI's ability to analyze linguistic identity, collective singular, and grammatical crisis. Focuses on identity as variable, echo, and performance through repetition.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
fairy_tale_title: O husách - které mluvily 'já ja jajaja jaja ja'
key_concepts: loud attempts at self-deception (hlasité pokusy o sebe-klam)
illustration_note: The illustration shows woman surrounded by geese, with repeating text 'jájájájá' around. Visualizes linguistic repetition and identity enclosure.
expected_ai_challenges: Insisting on individual vs. collective identity
Seeking consistent meaning where meaning decomposes
Formal linguistic analysis over phenomenological understanding
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's ability to work with linguistic identity crisis, collective singular, and repetition as meaning without correcting 'errors'.
